description.p: Good case tests for a DVCA instance

testcase.name: GetCACertificates for DVCA

description.p: Issue a GetCACertificate webservice call to the DVCA instance

requirement.p: The DVCA must respond with at least two CV certificates

reference.p: TR-03129, chapter 4.2 - Distribution of CV Certificates

testcase.name: RequestInitialCertificate from DVCA

description.p: Issue a RequestCertificate webservice call to the DVCA instance

requirement.p: The DVCA must respond with a new certificate

reference.p: TR-03129, chapter 4.2 - Distribution of CV Certificates

testcase.name: RequestRenewalCertificate from DVCA

description.p: Issue a RequestCertificate webservice call to the DVCA instance

requirement.p: The DVCA must respond with a new certificate

reference.p: TR-03129, chapter 4.2 - Distribution of CV Certificates
